entries.name: Fiddle::Pointer.malloc(size, freefunc = nil)  => fiddle pointer instanceclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Allocate size bytes of memory and associate it with an optional freefunc that will be called when the pointer is garbage collected.

entries.name: to_ptr(val)  => cptrclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Get the underlying pointer for ruby object val and return it as a Fiddle::Pointer object.

entries.name: ptr + n   => new cptrclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new pointer instance that has been advanced n bytes.

entries.name: ptrclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new Fiddle::Pointer instance that is a dereferenced pointer for this pointer.

entries.name: ptr - n   => new cptrclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new pointer instance that has been moved back n bytes.

entries.name: refclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new Fiddle::Pointer instance that is a reference pointer for this pointer.

entries.name: ptr <=> other   => -1, 0, 1, or nilclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns -1 if less than, 0 if equal to, 1 if greater than other.

entries.name: ptr == other    => true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if other wraps the same pointer, otherwise returns false.

entries.name: ptr[index]         = int                    →  intclick to toggle source
eql?(other) => true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if other wraps the same pointer, otherwise returns false.

entries.name: free => Fiddle::Functionclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Get the free function for this pointer.

entries.name: free=(function)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Set the free function for this pointer to function in the given Fiddle::Function.

entries.name: inspectclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a string formatted with an easily readable representation of the internal state of the pointer.

entries.name: null?click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if this is a null pointer.

entries.name: ptrclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new Fiddle::Pointer instance that is a dereferenced pointer for this pointer.

entries.name: refclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new Fiddle::Pointer instance that is a reference pointer for this pointer.

entries.name: sizeclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Get the size of this pointer.

entries.name: size=(size)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Set the size of this pointer to size

entries.name: to_iclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the integer memory location of this pointer.

entries.name: to_iclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the integer memory location of this pointer.

entries.name: to_valueclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Cast this pointer to a ruby object.
